GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix queue selection for mesh/OCB interfaces

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 5a9df31017999197b6e60535940f2f2fe1bd3b0d. For more details please see the references link.
